div.div:
Jiia - July 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.1
Works
This app works as advertised. Unfortunately it always shows the icon at left on JB. The level of English in this app is so poor it's hard to tell what some features are supposed to do.

Vinay - July 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.0
Love it, much needed app.
Thanks for being there when my ROM wasn't. :')

Bogdan - July 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.0
Needs more options
Read my old review and realized they fixed everything... 5 stars very worth it however!!!! The icon isn't being forced to the right anymore

ryan - July 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.0
Poor app design
Licensing errors! I've already paid for this app and every now and then I get a license error!

Tom - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.0
Nice update! But hope the battery icon can be brighter
Best partner of galaxy Nexus

Kelz - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.0
ESSENTIAL APP
I couldn't live without this app...After last update can no longer hide icon to the right, please fix and it will be 5 stars again...

William - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.7.0.0
New update issue
I love this app but the latest update does not allow you to hide the invisible icon at all.

Nathan - July 4, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.7.0.0
Great...
Great app but latest update has broken the ability for the icon to be forced to the right side

Sergio - June 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.2
Awesome
Not updating to top after last update :-( ---- Just what I was looking for. I use this app all the time, very convenient and well worth the price. Excellent customer support. Last update makes it even better. This is one of my favorite apps, and it's a must have for the Galaxy Nexus.

Antwonw - June 29, 2012 - Version 1.6.1.2
Needs Improvement for 4.1 Jelly Bean
It works on JB 4.1, but it needs some improvements. The watchdog no longer works so it won't keep it at the top. Not sure if the refresh interval is supposed to keep it at the top of the notification bar. If it is suppose to, then on JB it isn't working either. The only other thing not working on JB is the No Show Icon. It's not placing it on the far right. This is only a review of it on JB. On ICS 4.0.4 it worked perfectly! Galaxy Nexus (Toro) CMDA VZW LTE

Matthew - July 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.2
Amazing
New Jelly Bean update is great, looking forward to the ability to hide the icon however.

Hanoc - June 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.2
App
Great app!! Keeps getting better!

defsix - July 2, 2012 - Version 1.6.1.2
Super App
Does exactly what it says. No problems at all with. HD icons compared to other similar apps.

sidh - May 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
Useful
Very useful app. Could use a couple more settings:3G/4G toggle right from the notification bar rather than going into settings. Separate buttons for silent/vibrate/normal mode. Also transparent background will be nice with halo theme for all the icons. Overall, definitely worth the money. Keep up the good work!

Karlos The Jackal - May 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
Perfect!
This app gets better & better with each update & the latest one with the Watchdog made it perfect! Thank you Dev for a great app!

Nick - June 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
Just Great
For those of us too lazy to root this provides great functionality. Dev also responsive and helpful.

Karinae - June 30, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Neo V with version 1.6.1.0
bored....
always need license checking each time before launch app!!!!!!! why? I bought this app for what?? = =

Samitha - June 15, 2012 - Version 1.6.1.0
Very useful app
Very useful app for ICS devices. Worth the money. If you can keep the app top of the Notification bar, I would've given 5 stars..

Peu - June 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
add and tweak but good
please add auto-sleep ON/OFF toggle. And put the "Show the Panel" Button up top.

0xyg3n - June 13, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.6.1.0
Works ok
Can't seem to get it to stay at the top of the notification window on my One X watchdog is turned on and its still at the bottom of the list. Everything else works really well however.

Miriam - June 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
4G toggle
4g button is great. Now just need the GPS button to directly turn on n off instead of bringing you to options. Great app

Abie - May 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
Does exactly what says!
Just excellent. Would be perfect to be able to change order of icons!

jon - May 27, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.6.1.0
Nice
Would be better if we can make the background transparent and the icons holo in color

Ben - June 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.1.0
More Amazing Panel
This app is great. No more annoying toggle widgets! Works great with no issues on Galaxy Nexus.

Lord_Phoenix - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
Thank you!
One of the best and most useful app ever. Please make Brightness adjustable. I only need low or automatic. The rest is awesome!

Yannick - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
Almost
Add hotspot/tethering toggle and i will buy this app again

brassman - May 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
Updated! Not staying on top. Else, purty good..
Now does a good job staying on top... WOO HOO! 4=>5 stars!! ...Touchdown and the screenshot capture on my Galaxy Nexus always go on top, even after setting this panel to stay on top.. Always makes me hit a toggle when I don't want to.

Joshua - May 21, 2012 - Toshiba AT100 with version 1.6.0.0
After update it no longer works
Im using it on a Toshiba Thrive 10.1. Was working perfectly before the update. Please fix!!!

Munks - May 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
incredible app
I had no idea this was possible without root. highly recommended, most functional and useful app on market, does not affect battery what so ever. led flash support would be appreciated

John - May 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
No longer works
As of last update, app no longer works on galaxy nexus. Was a 5 star app.

Tom - May 23, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF201 with version 1.6.0.0
No Work
Doesnt work on Gnexus after update

Yerlan - May 22, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.6.0.0
The best app.
Cool app. Google Nexus S.

Márton - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
Cool piece of sw
It just works... :-)

Casey - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
Flashlight
Works on my galaxy nexus. Awesome.

Kikker - May 23, 2012 - Motorola XOOM with version 1.6.0.0
Just perfect
This is how Android should work out of the box

Steven - May 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.6.0.0
Nearly perfect
Probably my best app purchase. Flashlight works fine with my vzw gnex.

Troy - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Posting this review 5 minutes after buying
This is the first app I paid for for my new galaxy nexus and it is exactly what I wanted. The stock widget for controlling these settings is nice but it takes up room on the limited home screens (not rooted/standard launcher). This is great because I can get to the settings now from any screen. Its pretty ridiculous that this wasn't already built into ICS.

James - April 28, 2012 - HTC One S with version 1.5.0.0
Awsome
I don't need To install a custom from now. This should be standard on android.

Curt - April 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Excellent app!
Using this on my Samsung Galaxy Nexus and it is terrific. I put it on my wife's un-rooted Nexus also and the wireless tether function works great. Un-rooted! Excellent app, highly recommend.

Luke - May 12, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Good
The only annoyance is that the panel doesn't always stay at the top of the notification tray, even if you set it to do so. Even after updates this still hasn't been fixed.

Dionisis - April 25, 2012 - Version 1.5.0.0
Πολύ καλή εφαρμογή.
Πολύ χρήσιμη. Με μια κίνηση έχεις ακριβώς ότι χρειάζεσαι. Δεν έχω καταλάβει μόνo αν όντως δουλεύει η επιλογή να εμφανίζετε always on top η εφαρμογή δηλ. να βγαίνει πρώτη πριν από τα notifications, έχω την εντύπωση πως όχι. Τεσπα, λεπτομέρεια. Το more quickly panel είναι πραγματικά χρήσιμο για όσους θέλουν άμεση πρόσβαση σε αυτές τις επιλογές.

Argen - May 4, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.5.0.0
Must have
I have been looking for this and easy way to activate or deactivate wifi 3g or other settings without a widget that takes space on your deaktop

Jahrid - April 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Congratulations after the last update this app is official awesome 5 stars for ...
Congratulations after the last update this app is official awesome 5 stars for mobile data I have all the shortcuts I need but food for thought... Add a flashlight

3a4yI7aTiY - May 20, 2012 - Version 1.5.0.0
works on xyboard
Motorola Xyboard 10.1 android stock 3.2.2 all works well

Ise - April 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Excellent
Love the new update to keep the widget on top. Great ICS styling, could however use the addition of screen timeout button. It would be very useful on tablets.

Dave - April 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Love it
Perfect!

Anthony - May 19, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.5.0.0
Well worth the money
Paid for it a couple hours ago and feel that I owe it to the dev to write a review for his hard work. Best notification toggles I've used yet.

John - April 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
.
Works good on unlocked and rooted stock ICS. G-Nex

BOB-O - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Simply Fantastic
A must have app for the Galaxy Nexus

pauleyc - May 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Extremely useful
Excellent addition to a stock ROM. Won't always stay on top though; has to be reenabled after every reboot.

whiskey6 - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Great app q
Sanppy, simple, effective, and to the point.

Chris - May 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.5.0.0
Great
One of the best apps on the market. A must for ICS

Ray - April 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Totally awesome and useful tool
Very useful to have these settings that are actually toggles, not just shortcuts to settings in the notification bar. Doesn't need rooting either. This really should be built into Android. One nice thing would be a 3G/4G toggle, instead of the shortcut now. But still very much worth it.

Alistair - March 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Awesome now with hotspot
Been using from the start. Great app. Lightweight. Reliable. New hotspot in v1.4 works great provided you turn wifi off first. Verizon Galaxy Nexus stock 4.0.4.

Kahle - March 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Must have app
This is a must have app for any stock Galaxy Nexus. Addition of the option to launch your WiFi hotspots made this the perfect app. Nicely done.

paul - March 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
No brightness control
Unless you unlock and root your phone, this app is by far the best on the planet. Thank you for the update!

Steven - April 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Great for Galaxy Nexus
Needs option to rearrange icons, needs NFC toggle, 4g toggle could use a 4g icon - the phone icon is kind of misleading. Emailed dev and was very happy to get a response! I like this one better than the other "notif panel toggles"! Still room for improvement. ;-)

JMR - March 20, 2012 - Version 1.4.0.0
Simply brilliant.
This is the single most useful app I have on my Galaxy Nexus. I use it constantly; it has NEVER crashed; it is simple, well-designed, and beautiful to the eye. A+++++++++! The computer engineer(s) responsible should get an award.

King Louis - April 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Good
However it doesn't always stay at the top which is somewhat annoying

Netpluto - March 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Great App!
This is a lot better than using widget~ but for mobile data, any way to switch on immediately instead of checking the data enabled button?

Cori - March 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Absolutely Amazing!
Amazing app and features :-) keep it up! Galaxy Nexus 4.0.4

john - March 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Does what is says
Must have App. Thank you

Hamed - March 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Needs custom brightness
Needs customize option for brightness toggle, and I wish it used less resources.

noe - March 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
love it
It's almost perfect, it needs BRIGHTNESS GALAXY NEXUS!

caver - March 31, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Nice
Do what it say, but mute only mute notification, not all audio.

Jacob - April 23, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.4.0.0
Needs 4g and led flashlight toggles!
This app would be perfect if it only had 4g and led flashlight toggles! Until they get these toggles, I have no choice but to stick with the app called notification toggle

Jeff - April 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Great app
Perfect, exactly what I was looking for.

Pierre - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Good app!!
Just needs a brightness control and data control!! Oh and remove it from the notification bar instead of hiding.

Hoi Shan - March 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Brightness
Can i adjust the brightness

Fahad - March 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Fahad
Amazing and very usefull app Highly recommended for ICS users

Scott - April 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Love it
Fixes what's missing on my GNex

Frankie - March 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Best app ever

Dr. G - April 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.4.0.0
Gnex must have

Scott - March 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.1
One slight change
Just needs to be put into accessibility so it isn't a time interval. Just like "notification toggles." Much better look!

Daniel - March 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.1
wow. Last thing that was missing from my nexus!
Works very well. I'm recommending it for all my 4.0 friends :)

Kevin - March 19, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.3.0.1
Excellent, but ...
Really love this app especially the notification bar integration on ICS tablets but if it includes the "Screen Timeout" toggle along with the others that people requested, it would be perfect.

Mal - March 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.1
Excellent
I've been looking for something like this since ive had my galaxy nexus and this is just about perfect, just about. To make it perfect i would change the gps icon to on or off instead of going to the settings and to add a toggle for hotspot tethering but it's still a very very good app.

Marc - March 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.1
Need to add flashlight toggle

johnny - February 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Needs data switch
Amazing app once it gets data it will be perfect. Galaxy nexus.

Joel - March 23, 2012 - Version 1.3.0.0
Awesome but...
This is simply brilliant on my Motorola XOOM tablet but if would be even better on my phone which is OS ver 2.3 so I guess I'm just going to have to wait for the ICS update to be released.

Dracolan - February 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Great
Love this app! All it needs now is a 4G toggle

Francis - March 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Just what I've been looking for
It takes up minimal space on the notification bar. Looks sleek and is customizable!

NPC - February 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Nice
Useful on any phone. Update is causing the app to show up in multitasking menu. G.Nexus. holo is legit please make it ics blue.

Nemo - February 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Genius!
I have been looking for something like this for a while - at last it's here! Would love to see blue and green Holo icons as an option. Otherwise a perfect notification tray power widget. Well worth the price!

vitriolix - February 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Nice
Love the holo icons

Armondo - February 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.0.0
Galaxy Nexus
Works and looks great...

Zipko - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
IT MUST BE A BEST APP FOR GALAXY NEXUS!!!!!
very quickly, easy n simple to use with nice graphic!!!

Abdullah - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Must have for Galaxy Nexus
This is awesome on my galaxy nexus. With the addition of a brightness control I now give it five stars. Must have!

Nathan - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Work in progress.
Awesome dev! After last few updates this app is just about perfect! Thanks for listening!

h1ghsk0re - February 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Awesome app!
This is a great app. Look forward to more updates. Please add mobile hotspot or tethering option and it would be 6 stars!

Brian - February 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Galaxy Nexus
Its in my opinion, the best notification widget on the market. Just perfect. Thank you.

Patrik - February 5, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.2.0.1
Great addition to my ics alpha rom
Great updates, last wish is for wifi tether toggle, oh, and I guess 4g, if the devs ever get wimax for the evo working under ics

Marty - February 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
stellar app
Just need flashlight now. Thanks! Beautiful, functional, not pricey. Gives Cyanogen style notification toggles to unrooted Galaxy Nexus phones.

Michael - February 20, 2012 - Version 1.2.0.1
Wishing for more
REALLY want a toggle for the camera flash. So I can more easily use my phone as a flashlight.

PiP - February 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Deserves 5 stars regardless.
Would love to see official ICS power control icons used for the button images & the ability to re-order the buttons. However, the title says it all. Great app!

Jonathan - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Great app for nexus
Love this. Only need to fix GPS and add a 4G toggle and it would be perfect

mullins - February 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
good at all but...
pls add 1 more function, "mobile network" i would pay $1 more for it!

Pierre - February 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Almost perfect!
Please add flashlight button. And a NFC on/off button please :-)

purple-marauder - February 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Nice
Exactly what I wanted for my gnex. Five stars one I can rearrange the icons

Barry - February 4, 2012 - Version 1.2.0.1
you broke it!
The icons dont fill the area, theres a gap the size of one icon on my a500. It causes the other icons to crunch in and display wrong. FIX THIS, IT USED TO WORK.

Yawnimal - February 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Useful utility
Really well done utility and very useful!

陈昌盛 - February 16, 2012 - Version 1.2.0.1
need a switcher for my data usage
it will be five stars if it provides switcher for the data usage.

int19h - February 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Perfect
Having gotten use to this feature in Galaxy S2, I was waiting for a long time for someone to implement it as an installable app, now that ICS allows it. And this app fully delivers. All icons I need, great look, plus a way to keep in always on top of the drawer. Money well spend.

Filip - February 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
something to do
I miss possibility to resize toggles, order them and mobile data toggle.

sjakub - February 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Great!
Could use a flashlight switch.

herosmantle - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Brilliant
Developer listens to suggestions :)

Toonz, Da iLL, Diggler - February 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Brightness icon not working
Fix please

Yosmany - February 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Nicr
Convenient.

Zachery - February 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Needs a 4g toggle

Ben - February 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.1
Must have

pteale - February 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.0
Sync
Awesome you added sync that I asked 5, 5 stars as promised

Yuanjie - February 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.2.0.0
works great on galaxy nexus

Bobatty - January 25, 2012 - Version 1.1.2.1
Love it... could you add screen brightness?
This is a great app... works awesome on my Galaxy Nexus... could you add screen brightness? Keep up the great work!

Jason - January 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
Good addition
Add brightness controls and maybe a flashlight button and you're five stars.

Delvien - January 24, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.1.2.1
Good but not worth $ yet
Lack of brightness option and overall minimum features for a paid app.

Scott - January 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
Great!
Add a brightness slider and you have a 5+ star app!

Jeremy - January 26, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
No more Widgets for me!
Takes lots of settings and puts them somewhere convenient. Wish it had more options though

Eric - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
Pretty great
Excellent! Please add Screen Brightness, LTE, and LED flashlight toggles, and this would be perfect.

Marcus - January 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
Improving
I like the enhancements in the last upgrade. Keep improving dev!

Jim - January 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
Brilliant
Does exactly what it says, and does it well

Darrow - January 27, 2012 - Version 1.1.2.1
refunding
Wish it had more features

Ricky - January 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.1
Works
Good

gazab - January 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.0
Satisfied
Excellent app. Especially now when the notification icon is invisible AND right aligned. Only missing a brightness toggle!

Greg - January 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.0
Almost there.
Update interval working a little funky. Not implemented the way I thought. Can't it just be stuck at top always? Invisible icon now hidden properly.

Rod - January 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.0
Must-have app!
This is a great and must-have app to really and easily control those features of your phone you access all the time, such as wifi, bt, etc.

Reid - January 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.0
Getting better!
Missing brightness setting...GPS just takes you to settings page. Galaxy Nexus.

Ronald - January 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.0
Nice
Needs new toggles like brightness, sync and 4G LTE!

Scott - January 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.2.0
PERFECT!
Exactly what I was looking for and well worth the low cost. Samsung Galaxy Nexus ICS.

Roland - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Great
Just need some additional customization options. I know there is no direct way (api) to toggle 4g, but even bringing up settings dialog to do so would be great.

Skitzo - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
.
Should have been standard in ICS, but being it was lacking, this app is perfect & well worth every cent. THANK YOU!

Nick - December 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Great but...
Could use brightness setting and 4G toggle, and if possible no space for blank icon. But it looks and functions perfectly.

Patrick - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Quick request
When you hide the notification icon it displaces all the icons over the right one space. Pretty annoying but not the end of the world. Great functionality!

jeremie - January 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Love it
My droid charge had this native. I missed it on my galaxy nexus. Glad i can now have it on here as well.

jeremy - December 23, 2011 - Version 1.1.1.0
Good but not great...
When icon is hidden it still takes up the first icon spot. Also, it would be better if it stayed at the top of the notification list and not drop to the bottom of the notification list as notifications start filling in. When these are fixed I would give it 5 stars.

Steve - December 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Good app
Good app, probably 4 or 5 stars but when you hide the notification it only blacks it out, still there. 3/4gbtoggle would be killer too

Badsey - December 23, 2011 - Version 1.1.1.0
Just what I wanted!
Perfect, missed this from previous versions of android, next update should make it fit in more with 4.0

Brandon - December 23, 2011 - Version 1.1.1.0
Awesome...just needs a little more work
Very nice app. It works as it says. I do have to agree with other comments though. It would be nice to have a brightness setting and a flashlight button. Also, I did notice that new notifications show up above it in the list pushing it closer to the bottom of the page (which just makes it less convenient...especially if you have a lot of notifications). If these things could be addressed I'd give it 5 stars. edit: so it does look like it puts itself back on the top of the list....there is just a delay. -Galaxy Nexus

Evan - December 23, 2011 - Version 1.1.1.0
Great app, just a couple small changes.
This looks great on ICS. I'd like the ability to re-order items, add a brightness button, and the ability to get rid of the notification icon (not just hide it and leave an empty space).

Michael - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Great app!
Great app for Android ICS! Would love to see two features: brightness toggle (high, Med, low, auto) and toggle Lte on and off. 4stars for now

aLeXandEr - January 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
"NICE"
Anyone who doesn't think so because it don't always stay at the top, Not everyone knows root, roots, or wants root! For them, "NICE"!

Matthew - January 12, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Almost a Must Have
I'm glad Google finally added api's for this type of modification of Android, and this app makes good use of them, but there are some missing features. Some form of brightness needs to be added, and the ability to reorder the items would be nice. Also, the "close" button should be integrated with the battery and GPS toggles by default and not be separate. Custom rgb colors would be nice, too. Still a good app, but hopefully the developer will continue to improve upon it.

Eric - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Great on galaxy nexus
App works great on galaxy nexus. Needs at 4g and brightness switch as well.

tgwaste - December 22, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Uhm
Good idea but no brightness setting. Hate having an extra icon up top ( even if its hidden it still takes a space ). Cant arrange order.

Hunter - December 31, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Good app
Would give 5 stars but doesn't stay at top of status bar and takes up a space in the notification bar even when removed.

Christopher - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Very useful.

Joshua - December 23, 2011 - Version 1.1.1.0

Like many have said before, Sync and Brightness need to be options for this, as well as reboot/recovery for rooted users. Being able to adjust its color would be cool too, but that's more a suggestion than complaint. All in all, thrilled with my purchase, and look forward to more!

onec this is avaible i will rate higher other wise its very nice.

Chris - December 28, 2011 - Version 1.1.1.0
A Must Have for Minimalists
Great app! Truly a must have for people who hate clutter on their homescreen. There are a couple small issues (cosmetic not an issue with stability) that I am sure will get worked out shortly. Do not let that hold you back though, if you want quick access to controls without cluttering your home screen with another widget, or putting a custom ROM on your phone, then this is the way to go. Well worth the money.

Alden - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Awesome!
Great app... will be 5 stars when it has 3G / 4G toggle (I know a lot of US Galaxy Nexus owners would love easy access to that).

BB - January 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Works really well...
This does work well on the Galaxy Nexus.. some strange behavior for weather notifications show up above or below the panel...

Jem - January 19, 2012 - Version 1.1.1.0
Fix the few issues and it would be perfect!
As others have said, it's a fantastic app let down by a couple of minor issues. 1. The shortcuts should remain at the top of the notifications list at all times. It doesn't. 2. Being able to re-order the shortcuts would be good. Or, failing that, order them the same as TouchWiz (Wifi first). 3. The app notification should be able to be removed completely, not just blacked out. This causes other notifications to be pushed over to the right. 4. A brightness button would be nice for those who want it.

Hep - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.1.0
Nice!
Great, but would like screen brightness added & remove icon from top notification bar. Also, custom order of buttons would be cool.

Pyro - December 15, 2011 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.0.0.0
Great app, looks good!
Something like this should be stock in honeycomb. It Looks and works good like it was always meant to be there. Only 4 not 5 stars because of the nagging "reminder" it has to let you know it is running and the added icon it puts in the notification area.

div.p: please replace the up arrow with a brightness button. not only is the up arrow a useless button, but we can push up the notification bar or press home instead of the up arrow button. please replace with screen brightness and this will get 5 stars

div.h4: Good on Galaxy Nexus, just needs....

div.p: 1) Add brightness control 2) Change GPS button to toggle GPS on/off, then it's worthy of 5 stars. I've been looking settings from the notification bar like this since I got my OG Droid.
Needs work. Icon still takes up space when disabled. GPS doesn't actually turn GPS on or off, just takes you to the GPS settings screen. A few fixes and it'll be amazing.
Great app, NEEDS 4g toggle for LTE and GSM nexus! Also NFC and Flashlight toggle wouldn't be bad options either!

div.div:
darthbator - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S
The OS should come with this
This fills a gap that android phones really should come with. I could think of some minor things to add (wiimax/4G switch, brightness). I also noticed when you hide the icon it creates a strange little blank area. However all in all awesome.

div.h4: Not good enough for paid app

div.p: The app is Ok. It misses the Data On/Off Toggle which is a must for me. Generally it is a way to simple (to few features) app in order to be a paid app. My conclusion: It is not worth the money.

I installed a beta build of ICS on my Droid X. This works great! Exactly what I've been looking for! Feature request: Have the GPS button turn GPS on/off Rearrange order of buttons Brightness setting short click and long press actions Launch custom app Volume shortcut that displays different levels Flashlight toggle (integrate with TeslaLED?) Great work!
Works perfect on the Toshiba Thrive. Honeycomb 3.2
I love this app on my Nexus, but please add Data button, and add to buttons long press to go in the settings.
